entry.title: Russian Soldier Didn't Commit Murder, His Lawyer Says
entry.content: The Russian tank sergeant who admitted killing a civilian in Ukraine isn’t guilty of intentional murder, his attorney said as a closely watched war-crimes trial drew to a close, setting the stage for a verdict next week.

entry.title: Ukrainian Families Risk Their Lives to Escape Russian Occupation
entry.content: Russian forces moved into the small town of Orikhiv, about 100 miles from Mariupol, soon after Moscow first ordered its invasion of Ukraine. The town’s residents faced explosions and shootings on a daily basis, forcing them to take the decision to leave.
